listitem.para: : XXX JR XXX grid-proxy-init will use the time from the last issued command. To avoid setting a time shorter than one already existing we should first issue a grid-proxy-info, check if there is a running proxy, its time left, see if it is longer than what we want to set and if it is, then do NOTHING to avoid setting it shorter.

: XXX JR XXX grid-proxy-init will use the time from the last issued command. To avoid setting a time shorter than one already existing we should first issue a grid-proxy-info, check if there is a running proxy, its time left, see if it is longer than what we want to set and if it is, then do NOTHING to avoid setting it shorter.
